examples: Our reporters will give a running commentary (= a continuous one) on the election results as they are announced.
Nuestros reporteros darán un comentario continuo (= uno continuo) sobre los resultados de las elecciones a medida que se anuncien.
He kept up a running commentary on everyone who came in or went out.
Mantuvo un comentario continuo sobre todos los que entraban o salían.
a critical commentary on the final speech of the play
un comentario crítico sobre el discurso final de la obra
